name: MyTelegramOrgRoBot
description: get your APP ID and API HASH inside Telegram

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

URL.description: The Heroku App URL similar to https://<appname>.herokuapp.com/

APP_SHORT_NAME.description: specify a custom alphamumeric shortname (5-32 characters)

FTEXT.description: the footer text that will be seen in the bot message, after the final edit

START_TEXT.description: the start text of the Telegram bot

AFTER_RECVD_CODE_TEXT.description: the message that should be displayed before receiving the code from the user

BEFORE_SUCC_LOGIN.description: a temporary message that will be displayed after receiving the code, and before the validations

ERRED_PAGE.description: a string which will **never** occur, but still exists?

CANCELLED_MESG.description: a message that should be shown on /cancel

IN_VALID_CODE_PVDED.description: a string which will **never** occur, but still exists?

IN_VALID_PHNO_PVDED.description: a message that will be shown if `get_phno_imn_ges` logic, breaks
IN_VALID_PHNO_PVDED.value: 𝚂𝚘𝚛𝚛𝚢 ! 𝙱𝚞𝚝 𝚃𝚑𝚎 𝙸𝚗𝚙𝚞𝚝 𝙳𝚘𝚎𝚜 𝙽𝚘𝚝 𝚂𝚎𝚎𝚖 𝚃𝚘 𝙱𝚎 𝙰 𝚅𝚊𝚕𝚒𝚍 𝙿𝚑𝚘𝚗𝚎 𝙽𝚞𝚖𝚋𝚎𝚛 𝚆𝚑𝚒𝚌𝚑 𝙸𝚜 𝚒𝚗 𝙵𝚘𝚛𝚖𝚊𝚝 (+𝟷𝟿𝟾𝟽𝟼𝟻𝟺𝟹𝟸𝟷𝟶)
